page.title: 05NEW ABBEY - ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Professional entertainment in the area includes television in the home, cinema in Dumfries, and also Queen of the South professional football. The Guild of Players are amateurs who present a monthly play in their own theatre in Dumfries while the Operatic Society performs annually. In the village of New Abbey the Over 65 Club holds a social evening with a concert party,an evening bus drive, an all day bus drive with a catered meal and a Christmas social with Christmas dinner. Abbeyvale amateur F.C. holds regular matches during the football season. They also run a domino tournament for senior citizens in the Criffel Inn at Christmas. The Primary School has an annual school concert to which all in the village are invited.
